The '''pet mooshroom''' is a pet variant of the [[mooshroom]] introduced in [[25w14craftmine]].

== Spawning ==
A pet mooshroom spawns next to the player on [[Mine (dimension)|mine]] start when the "Pet Mooshroom" [[Player Unlock]] is active.

== Drops ==
Pet mooshroom drops nothing when it's killed.

== Behavior ==
The pet mooshroom is similar to the regular [[mooshroom]], but there are still some differences:
*The [[player]]'s [[melee attack]] cannot damage the pet mooshroom.
*The player cannot obtain [[milk bucket]] by {{control|using}} a [[bucket]] on a pet mooshroom.
*The player cannot obtain [[mushroom stew]] by {{control|using}} a [[bowl]] on a pet mooshroom.
*The brown variant of pet mooshroom cannot be [[fed]] [[flower]]s.
